A lot of twists and deaths. I feel like: very poor\, too many jokes\, luke asks \"wheres han\" then they cut the scene right there.. so you dont even get to see lukes reaction to han solos death.. after all theyve been through and they dont continue a scene with lukes reaction to his hans death\, dissapointing\, alot of the plot didnt make sense with the first order\, this star wars was a real let down.
